inclusion.criterion: Patients that have elected to undergo either partial or total knee replacement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: as well as a control group of patients free of lower extremity pathology
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Sensory, neurological, or general health conditions that alter perception of the patient's limb in space
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Vestibular disorders will be excluded in order to protect against falls during functional testing
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Unable to understand the questions used to obtain the Knee Society Score
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Minors and prisoners will be excluded from the study
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease, but is on medications that help with shaking and slow movement. He still experiences difficulty initiating movements, stiffness, and slowness.
